original_text: Now Naaman, captain of the host of the king of Syria, was a great man with his master, and honourable, because by him the Lord had given deliverance unto Syria: he was also a mighty man in valour, but he was a leper.
korean_text: 아람 왕의 군대 장관 나아만은 그의 주인 앞에서 크고 존귀한 자니 이는 여호와께서 전에 그에게 아람을 구원하게 하셨음이라 그는 큰 용사이나 나병환자더라

sentences.original_text: Now Naaman, captain of the host of the king of Syria
sentences.korean_translation: 이에 나아만은 시리아 왕의 군대 장관이었으니

sentences.original_text: was a great man with his master
because by him the Lord had given deliverance unto Syria
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그를 통해 주께서 시리아에 구원을 주셨기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: he was also a mighty man in valour
